item.title: Thread on contextual bandits, medicine, and web advertising
item.description:
Alexandros Marinos (is in Crete) on Twitter

‚ÄúNowhere in nature do we see an equivalent to the billion-dollar RCT. Facebook engineer Jeff Hammerbacher is famously quoted for having said: ‚ÄúThe best minds of my generation are thinking about how to make people click ads‚Äù. Maybe they weren‚Äôt totally wasting their time after all?‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/alexandrosm/status/1435565867471757312?s=21&t=0au3sPXsLIIZDSac3acgSg

item.title: Come On, Man
item.description:
During the 2020 Democratic primary, Joe Biden told voters that as president, he‚Äôd get Republicans in line. A year-and-a-half out from his inauguration, it‚Äôs clear that hasn‚Äôt happened. He‚Äôs not up to the challenge.The Flashpoint is a reader-supported publication. To receive new posts and support my work, consider becoming a free or paid subscriber‚Ä¶

URL: https://eoinhiggins.substack.com/p/come-on-man?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Fed Overreacting?, & √æhe Post-1870 Speed of Transformation & Its Consequences, &

item.title: Most Americans Are Doing Well. For Now.
item.description:
The typical U.S. household earned more than ever as of May‚Äîeven after accounting for inflation. And their finances were secure, with consumer spending rising at a steady clip even as their saving rate remained elevated. This is being obscured by the misfortunes of America‚Äôs investors, who are being hit by huge tax payments owed on capital gains from 2021, falling asset values so far this year, and ongoing weakness in cash distributions via interest and dividends‚Ä¶

URL: https://theovershoot.co/p/most-americans-are-doing-well-for?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Fed Overreacting?, & √æhe Post-1870 Speed of Transformation & Its Consequences, &

item.title: We're getting an Omicron-optimized booster many months too late
item.description:
The FDA is calling for booster shots to be reformulated this fall to specifically target the Omicron variant of the SARS-CoV-2 virus. The mRNA technology behind the shots is supposed to make it fairly easy to tweak vaccines to target new variants. And the virus has evolved so rapidly that an update seems obviously warranted ‚Ä¶

URL: https://www.slowboring.com/p/were-getting-an-omicron-optimized?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

item.title: The Right
item.description:
Listen now (35 min) | For all of the mainstream media‚Äôs coverage of Donald Trump, there‚Äôs not a very deep understanding of the Republican Party under that president, or, indeed, the forces that led up to his election. In the liberal press, there just has not been that much curiosity about the nuances of the American conservative movement ‚Äî and the historical and political fo‚Ä¶
